SELECT
  (SELECT MAX(completed_at) FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status='done') AS last_success,
  (SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, MAX(completed_at), NOW()) FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status='done') AS minutes_since_last_success,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status='running' AND started_at < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AS stuck_jobs,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status='error' AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AS errors_1h,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status='done' AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AS done_1h,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM establishments) AS total_estab,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locality_content) AS total_content
UPDATE scrape_jobs SET status='error', error_log='watchdog: stuck >1h' WHERE status='running' AND started_at < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR
